name: ICDeviceLocationTypeMask
desc: Masks for detecting different device locations.

items.name: case bluetooth
items.desc: A mask for detecting a paired Bluetooth device.

items.name: case bonjour
items.desc: A mask for detecting a network device that publishes a Bonjour service.

items.name: case local
items.desc: A mask for detecting a local device, such as USB or FireWire.

items.name: case remote
items.desc: A mask for detecting a remote device, such as a shared, Bonjour, or Bluetooth device.

items.name: case shared
items.desc: A mask for detecting a device shared by another Mac host.
